properties.areaDesc: Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Northwest Blue Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 3 at 1:09PM PST until February 5 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...WINTER STORM TO IMPACT THE REGION BEGINNING TUESDAY AFTERNOON
THROUGH EARLY WEDNESDAY EVENING...

.A storm system will move into the region Tuesday afternoon.
Abundant moisture will result in heavy amounts of snow for the
mountains and high valleys before snow levels rise and
precipitation changes to rain.

* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15
inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. In Oregon,
Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon.

* WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday evening.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING
